attributes.additional_details: The government or government after it needs to reform the UK's outdated laws like tv licence.
attributes.background: TV licence is a huge bother, it has broke many families and is a financial waste. No more tv licence it's a waste of time and the UK shoul make it optional as it's a shame to have to pay for a bunch of live pixels

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Scrap the BBC TV Licence & replace funding with adverts or paywall
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727365
